mapper.select:
SELECT tel.id, `module`, uri, `name`, description, error_method, message, request_method, ip_address, ip_source, os, browser, create_time FROM ( SELECT id FROM t_exception_log
`module` like concat('%',#{condition.optModule},'%')
OR description like concat('%',#{condition.keyword},'%')
ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{limit},#{size} ) temp LEFT JOIN t_exception_log tel ON temp.id = tel.id
